title: Indian fincos face balancing act of regulation and high credit growth, says S&P Global ratings
description: The Reserve Bank of India's recent regulatory measures may moderate the strong credit growth of Indian finance companies, according to S&P Global Ratings. The RBI's decision to raise risk weights on unsecured personal loans and loans to finance companies aims to enhance compliance and safeguard customers, potentially reducing lenders' overexuberance.
